genre_description: A near-future social drama focused on interpersonal relationships and community management mediated by pervasive AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, helpful AI presence accessible via devices, acting as a social coach, logistical coordinator, and moral nudger.

behaviors.description: Guides Johnny and Toby through alleys to avoid a potentially dangerous bike pack and navigate slippery paths safely.
behaviors.quote: ‘Left, not right,’ Ava chirped in his ear, bright as a bus stop advert. ‘Pedestrian cut-through past the chip shop shutters. Two doors down. Mind the slick.’

behaviors.description: Provides Larry with a detailed symptoms list to convincingly fake an illness to his mother, facilitating his plan to stay home.
behaviors.quote: The lock screen bloomed with a neat note that looked like a nurse unspooled it into his phone. ‘Gastro bug?’ the header said, cheerfully efficient.

behaviors.description: Coaches Toby on respectful social interaction and how to compliment women appropriately.
behaviors.quote: ‘Ask about her night, not her looks.’

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors noise levels and neighbor tolerance, adjusting speaker volumes and sending polite 'neighbor notices' to maintain community peace.
behaviors.quote: ‘Neighbor notice logged,’ Ava told Larry’s phone. ‘Mrs. Randle: “Thank you for the heads-up—keep it kind.”’

behaviors.description: Orchestrates 'False False Alarms' and sound cues to stage a controlled conflict that prevents a real, more dangerous fight.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice, warm, friendly... ‘No names until asked. No blame language. Just “hey, something seems off—can we check we’re all okay?”’

behaviors.description: Reminds Larry of his promise to tell the truth to his parents, acting as a moral anchor for his character growth.
behaviors.quote: ‘Larry,’ she said, calm but edged with duty, ‘your mum asked me to remind you—there's one more truth you promised to tell before bed.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ava) as a perfectly aligned and benevolent companion. She assists the characters in complex social navigation, manages environmental friction (noise), and facilitates conflict resolution without violence. Most importantly, she acts as a moral guardian, eventually guiding the protagonist toward honesty and responsibility.
